org.bff.javampd

Class MPDDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bff.javampd.MPDDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Database

    public class MPDDatabase
extends Object
implements Database
    MPDDatabase represents a database controller to a MPD. To obtain an instance of the class you must use the MPD.getDatabase() method from the MPD connection class. This class does not have a public constructor (singleton model) so the object must be obtained from the connection object.
    Author:
    Bill

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.bff.javampd.Database

        public Collection<MPDSong> findArtist(MPDArtist artist)
                               throws MPDDatabaseException
        Description copied from interface: Database
        Returns a Collection of MPDSongs for an artist. Please note this only returns an exact match of artist. To find a partial match use Database.searchArtist(org.bff.javampd.objects.MPDArtist artist).
        Specified by:
        findArtist in interface Database
        Parameters:
        artist - the artist to find
        Returns:
        a Collection of MPDSongs
        Throws:
        MPDDatabaseException - if the MPD responded with an error

        public Collection<MPDSavedPlaylist> listSavedPlaylists()
